item.title: Warehouse Flatpak Toolbox
item.description: What is it? # Warehouse is a versatile toolbox for managing Flatpak user data, viewing Flatpak app info, and batch managing installed Flatpaks. Main Features : - Viewing Flatpak Info: ðŸ“‹ Warehouse can display all the information provided by the Flatpak list command in a user-friendly graphical window.
